articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Reelection as Chairman of NDC Celebrated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Reelection as Chairman of NDC Celebrated
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Ministry of People's Security took place on Saturday to warmly congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 At the meeting a reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's reelection to the top post of the state has provided a decisive guarantee for firmly defending, carrying forward and accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche under the ever-victorious banner of Songun and opened an immensely rosy future for the country and the people, the era and the revolution.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is making a great leap forward toward a great prosperous and powerful nation, demonstrating its might before the world as an invincible political and ideological power in which all the servicepersons and people are united around the headquarters of the revolution as firm as a rock and a military power with the matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and the capacity for self-defence, they said that the stirring reality is a miracle of history wrought by the DPRK as it has held Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the people's security officials and men and the servicepersons of the People's Security Force to display their honor as the political defenders of the Workers' Party of Korea in defending the country and building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation true to his Songun leadership.
					
					 An oath-taking meeting of young vanguard was held at Jonsung Square on the same day for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation, holding him in high esteem as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 Responding to the call of the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, all the participants took a solemn pledge to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in the forests of Mt. Paektu generation after generation.
					
					 They expressed their determination to become the first death-defying corps defending Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically and at the risk of their lives and the young vanguard consolidating the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks centering around the headquarters of the revolution as firm as a rock, holding the banner of devotedly defending the leader. 
					
					 Among those present at the meeting was Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Festival Participants Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Festival Participants Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China Federation of Literature and Art Circles headed by Vice-President Bai Shuxiang, an Indonesian government cultural delegation led by General Secretary of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism Wardiyatmo, artistes of different countries and overseas Korean artistes  participating in the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche,  Sunday wrapped in solemn feelings to pay homage to President  Kim Il Sung.
					 They made deep bows to the President in the memory of the unforgettable facts that whenever he watched performances given by them in the festivals he was the first to give them big hand with bright smile in his face.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ratna Sari Dewi Sukarno, director of the Dewi Sukarno Office in Japan who is honorary chairperson of the Association for Supporting Dissemination of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, and other foreign guests paid their respects to the President.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Race Held
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Race Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The IAAF-22nd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Race was held here on Sunday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industry who is also chairman of the DPRK Marathon Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Among those present were marathoners of the DPRK, China, Ethiopia, Zimbabwe, South Africa, Botswana, Kenya and Namibia.
					
					 Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, made an opening address.
					
					 Then followed the race.
					
					 After leaving the starting line men and women marathoners ran the course of the race through Hyoksin, Yongung, Chollima, Rakwon and Kwangbok Streets.
					
					 At the race Wang Zemin of China and Phyo Un Suk of the DPRK came first, Reinhold Lita of Namibia and Kim Kum Ok of the DPRK second and Jackson Kipchoge Rono of Kenya and Jong Yong Ok of the DPRK third.
					
					 At the closing ceremony the results of the race were published and prizes were conferred on marathoners who gave good accounts of themselves.

articles.title: Students Basketball Games Held
articles.content:
Students Basketball Games Held
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- National basketball games of students for commemorating the Day of the Sun were held in Sariwon, North Hwanghae Province from April 3 to 10. 
					 The games brought together more than 30 groups. They competed in league matches, being divided into university and college sectors.
					
					 Men and women players of Kim Il Sung University proved successful at the university games while men players of Unpha College of Agriculture in North Hwanghae Province and women players of Pyongyang College of Statistics at the college games.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Borodavkin, the first vice-chairman of the Committee for Northern and Far Eastern Issues of the State Duma of Russia and deputies to the State Duma and the Federation Council of Russia and personages of political parties and government ministries, organizations and institutions.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and made bows.
					
					 They looked round photos on display on the subject of "Day of the Sun of Korea."
					
					 Kim Yong Jae said in the speech at the reception that Kim Il Sung was the peerless patriot and legendary great man who performed undying exploits before the times, the revolution, the country and the people with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and great revolutionary practices, regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia with a long history and tradition are now developing on good terms under the care of the top leaders of the two countries, he said, hoping that the Russian people would achieve greater successes in their efforts to build powerful Russia.
					
					 Borodavkin said that the friendly and cooperative relations between Russia and the DPRK the foundation of which was provided by Kim Il Sung are now successfully developing in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Noting that Russia is making sustained efforts to push ahead with multisided programs between the two countries and enrich them with new contents to meet the requirements of the times, he wished the DPRK success in the socio-economic development and its people prosperity and welfare.

articles.title: Dominican President Supports Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
Dominican President Supports Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Leonel Antonio Fernandez Reyna, president of the Dominican Republic who is chairman of the Dominican Liberation Party, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea on March 29.
					 The president noted that Dominica established friendly relations with the DPRK long ago and has since developed them.
					
					 Noting that he is rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people are achieving great successes in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation with strong will and fighting spirit, he sincerely hoped that Korea would be reunified as early as possible.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolia Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development led by D. Baterdena and a Bangladesh delegation for the Study of the Songun Policy headed by M. Jahangir Khan arrived here Sunday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					Meanwhile, a delegation of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong of China headed by its General Manager Wang Dongping, a delegation of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun of China led by its General Manager Yang Hongzhun and delegations of associations of supporting dissemination of immortal flowers in different countries arrived here today to participate in the 11th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves against DPRK and Chongryon Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves against DPRK and Chongryon Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The recent racket for confrontation with the DPRK kicked up by the Japanese reactionaries before and after its satellite launch is nothing but a madcap rowdyism which can be committed only by schizophrenics, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is needless to say that it is a revelation of the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to use the said satellite launch for inciting an atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK in all fabrics of the Japanese society and propelling their moves to turn Japan into a military giant.
					
					 However, they are finding themselves in such a deplorable position no more than a dog barking at the moon after the successful launch of the satellite. They have been ridiculed by the international community for their repeated release of "misinformation".
					
					 Upset by this, the Japanese reactionaries are persistently calling for applying "sanctions" against the DPRK at the UN forum and, at the same time applying "additional sanctions" while imposing political persecution on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan. This is evidenced by the ever-growing suppression, threat and terrorist act against Chongryon institutions and Koreans in Japan. Some days ago, the Japanese authorities revealed their attempt to freeze the properties of Chongryon allegedly to "cut off the source of funds" under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch. This clearly testifies to the moral vulgarity peculiar to the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 Their crackdown on Chongryon and Koreans in Japan precisely means a grave political provocation against the DPRK and another vicious move for confrontation with it. It will never remain a passive onlooker to their frenzied suppression and persecution against Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan but adopt strict countermeasures to them.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to behave with discretion, facing up to the reality, and stop at once the unreasonable suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japan Branded as Sworn Enemy of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Japan Branded as Sworn Enemy of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Japan is the sworn enemy historically doing harm to the Korean nation. Minju Joson Sunday says this in a signed commentary carried with the approach of the lapse of 417 years since the Japanese aggressors unleashed a war of aggression against Korea in 1592 (Imjin year) and reduced it to ruins, trampling underfoot its territory.
					 Hundreds years have passed since then but the Korean people always remember the inhuman and criminal killings, arson, plunder and abduction committed by the bestial Japanese aggressors in Korea, the commentary notes.
					
					 Citing facts to prove the unheard-of massacres, plunder and abduction committed by the Japanese aggressors born with disposition and nature of beasts in the temporarily occupied areas of Korea, it goes on: 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries are beautifying and whitewashing Japan's crime-woven history by eulogizing the history of aggression against Korea by Hideyoshi Toyodomi, the leader of aggression of the Imjin war, and visiting the place where his remains is enshrined in consolation of his "soul". 
					
					 Japan felt no remorse of conscience for the criminal atrocities committed by it in Korea during the Imjin war and afterwards it occupied Korea and committed colonial exploitation and plunder.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have not yet made apology and reparation for killings and forcible drafting against Koreans and ultra-large state crimes such as those related to "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army. It is as clear as noonday that it is aimed at realizing their ambition for reinvasion at any cost.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries remain unchanged in their aggressive nature and ambition though 60 odd years have passed since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists and they are becoming ever-more undisguised in their moves for reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 The Korean nation's bitterness toward Japan is hundreds of years old and in case it explodes no one can predict its results.

articles.title: Independent Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Independent Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- All the Korean people should check and frustrate the anti-reunification and bellicose forces' vicious moves and more dynamically conduct a patriotic drive for opening the gate for national reunification, upholding the banner of "By our nation itself."
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The conservative ruling forces of south Korea are desperately standing against the national reconciliation and unity and its reunification, taking to flunkeyism and dependence on outsiders.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea appealed to all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad to turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle against the Lee Myung Bak group. It was a very realistic step. 
					
					 All the Koreans should decisively reject the south Korean authorities' sycophantic and treacherous theory of giving priority to foreign forces and firmly protect the dignity and interests of the nation. 
					
					 They should resolutely frustrate the reckless DPRK-targeted war provocations of the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces, irrespective of ideology, ism and the partisan interests and strategy for the sake of peace and security of the country.
					
					 It is urgent requirement of the reality to further the struggle for democracy against dictatorship in south Korea. 
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life looking forward to living in a new democratic world free from fascist dictatorship should decisively check and frustrate the authorities' frantic moves aimed at building up a dictatorial system, enacting fascist laws and suppressing the pro-reunification and democratic forces, holding high the slogan for democracy against dictatorship.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad should stage the grand national march for the country's reunification in firm unity under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The united struggle in the spirit of "By our nation itself" is the way for achieving the independent reunification of the country. It is truth instilled by the June 15 era of reunification into the mind of all the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 All the Korean people should unite as one under the banner of "By our nation itself" with firm confidence and optimism about reunification and turn out in the patriotic drive for realizing the cause of independent reunification as early as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Air-lifting Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Air-lifting Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The puppet 6th army corps of south Korea staged madcap exercises of air-lifting river-crossing and bridge equipment in the area near the Military Demarcation Line on April 9, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The warmongers mobilized several helicopters and troops of engineering unit to stage the frantic exercises of rapidly air-lifting river-crossing equipment to the Rimjin River in Phaju and setting them up.
					
					 The puppet bellicose forces also staged the exercises of air-lifting bridge equipment for ensuring movement of the armed forces in the mountainous area in Kyonggi Province. 
					
					 The ceaseless war exercises recently staged by the Lee Myung Bak puppet warlike forces against the DPRK in the area near the MDL prove who is to blame for disturbing peace and blocking reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Moves to Block Inter-Korean Relations Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Moves to Block Inter-Korean Relations Flailed
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a statement on April 8 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its moves to cut off the inter-Korean relations.
					 The statement accused the "Ministry of Unification" of barring the Teachers' Union of south Korea and workers of Inchon from visiting the DPRK on April 7.
					
					 It held that their visit to the DPRK was aimed to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration through exchange and solidarity among workers in the south and the north. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee "government" stands in the way of exchange between even NGOs while persisting in its confrontational policy toward the DPRK, it said, adding this is prompted by the intention to totally bedevil the inter-Korean relations and perpetuate national division.
					
					 The Lee regime had better clearly understand that its persistent pursuance of hostile policy toward the DPRK would precipitate its destruction, it warned.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea called a news conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on April 8 to denounce Japan's ever-more pronounced moves to revive militarism.
					 The organization disclosed Japan's recent frantic moves to realize its ambition for reviving militarism and becoming a military giant while talking about "threat to security" over the DPRK's satellite launch.
					
					 It asserted that such reckless behavior of Japan clearly shows who the main culprit threatening peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world is.
					
					 By resorting to hostile acts towards the DPRK Japan seeks to aggravate military tension in the Korean Peninsula and its surrounding areas and thus secure a pretext of increasing military expenditure, it held.
					
					 The organization urged Japan to withdraw the anti-DPRK confrontational policy threatening peace and drop its foolish dream for turning the archipelago into a military giant and going nuclear.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle took place at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Apr. 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The participants laid floral baskets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and watched Korean film "The Arch of Triumph."
					
					 The son of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Li Zade, Zhang Jinlu, daughter of anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua, Zhou Wei and Feng Yila, daughters of Zhou Baozhong and Feng Zhongyun related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and the daughter of Liu Hanxing related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle spoke at the meeting.
					
					 They looked back with deep emotion on the immortal exploits the President performed for developing the world revolution and the Sino-Korean friendship and the boundless loving care he showed for them.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Il who is carrying forward the intention of the President has invariably shown loving care for the families of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 They warmly congratulated the Korean people on their successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and other big successes they have achieved under the energetic Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, thus dealing telling blows at the imperialists and their followers and instilling confidence and encouragement into the world peace-loving people.
					
					 They extended congratulations to Kim Jong Il upon his reelection as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would surely open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, which marks the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Holidays Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Holidays Observed
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in the Czech Republic, France and Mongolia on Apr. 2 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association who is also chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, highly praised the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung performed on behalf of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Saying that the cause of Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, he added that the DPRK has frustrated every move of the imperialist reactionaries for aggression thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung by providing historic roots of the Songun politics, a symbol of the dignity and honor of the DPRK and an invincible treasured sword, would shine forever along with thriving socialist Korea.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Literary College of Mongolia referred to the facts that the DPRK has turned into a powerful country no one dares provoke thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il and that it strikingly demonstrates the might and justness of the politics all over the world.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars in the Czech Republic and France.

articles.title: Successful Satellite Launch of DPRK Hailed
articles.content:
Successful Satellite Launch of DPRK Hailed 
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Misr Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and Swedish organizations released statements on Apr. 6 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The Egyptian party said in its statement that the DPRK's successful launch of the satellite meant another brilliant victory achieved by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation while frustrating all sorts of obstructions and pressure on the part of the imperialist forces under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and a great auspicious event which demonstrated the will and national power of the DPRK.
					
					 Extending full support and solidarity to the friendly Korean people, the statement expressed belief that they would achieve a greater success in their struggle for increasing the national power.
					
					 The Swedish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted in its statement that the successful launch of the carrier rocket and the satellite developed by the Korean people with their own wisdom and technology is a great victory of the Juche idea.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's exercise of its independent right for the peaceful use of outer space, it pointed out.
					
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association stressed in its statement that it warmly congratulates Kim Jong Il on the successful launch of the satellite.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa who is also chairman of the Pretoria Branch of the Democratic Teachers Union of South Africa, released a statement on Apr. 4 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country."
					 The statement said that Kim Il Sung indicated detailed ways for founding independent, peaceful and neutral reunified state through the great unity of the nation and achieving the unity of the nation in the 10-point programme.
					
					It noted that all the Korean people are dynamically waging the struggle for achieving reunification of the country through the great unity of the nation true to the noble patriotic intention for reunification of  General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is successfully carrying forward the President's idea of reunification.
					
					 It stated that today all the world progressive people positively support the stand of the DPRK to achieve reunification of the country through the great unity of the nation not depending on foreign forces and hope that the division of Korea would end as early as possible.
					
					 We regard that the key to Korea's reunification lies in achieving the great unity of the whole Korean nation as indicated in the above-said programme set forth by Kim Il Sung, it stressed.
					
					 It asserted that the south Korean ruling forces should drop the anti-reunification and treacherous policy and make a switchover to reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) respectively issued statements on April 5 to hail the DPRK's successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, praised General Secretary Kim Jong Il for having won another epoch-making triumph by working heart and soul while making ceaseless journey for the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and concurrently chairman of its National Rights Committee, said that the said launch demonstrated to the world that the Korean people are sure to win in their drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and concurrently chairman of its Rights and Welfare Committee, mentioned that the Kwangmyongsong-2 is transmitting the melodies of immortal revolutionary paeans "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" while flying in outer space, adding: This goes to prove that the historic oath made by   Kim Jong Il on Ryongnam Hill to glorify Korea to the world is becoming a reality. 
					
					 Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and concurrently director of its Information and Publicity Department, expressed his will to devote his all to the patriotic work of Chongryon full of confidence sharing the same mind and breathing the same breath with the people in the homeland, bearing deeper in mind the truth that the prosperity of the country guarantees happiness of Koreans in Japan with the satellite launch as a momentum.
